title: namba vENDum
sahitya:
namba vENDum manidA paramporuLai


anupallavi

  vambu vazhakkai viTTu mAsaTra manam toTTu tambam asUyai inri dAsanAik-kumbiTTu


caraNam    nAttikap-paDippinri sAttira naDippinri nAyanmAr pOlavE tUya uLLanbuDan
pAttira mAyaruT-paNi sheidu vandippAi parama karuNAnidhi varumun antarangattil
